title: Engine Cleaning: Ferrari, Corvette, and GT40 -- /DRIVE CLEAN
description: DRIVE CLEAN welcomes you to Classic Car Club Manhattan for this week's episode on engine cleaning. There are 8 basic techniques that will require some variation as you change between modern, muscle, and exotic cars. Watch as we repeat these 8 steps for each of these scenarios while using a Corvette Z06, Ford GT40, and Ferrari 458 as demo cars. Remember, regular engine cleaning will increase the longevity of your motor by preventing corrosion and interference around exposed components.
tags: Engine cleaning, how to clean an engine, engine detailing, Ferrari 458, Ford GT40, Corvette Z06
